questions.question: Diabetes is a disease that changes the way the body uses:
Exercise helps people manage diabetes because:
options: it helps them maintain a healthy weight
it helps their bodies use insulin
it helps reduce their risk of heart disease

questions.question: True or false: Being sick doesn’t affect someone with diabetes.
What part of the body doesn’t make insulin in a person with type 1 diabetes?
What is a glucose meter?
options: A device that measures blood pressure
A device that measures blood sugar
questions.answer: A device that measures blood sugar
